attributes.action: Look into discrimination regarding the Winter Fuel Allowance to those living overseas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many of us who permanently live abroad are denied the Winter Fuel Allowance solely because we were not resident in the UK during a certain week in our 60th year. This ruling is clearly unjust as we had no way of knowing about it until we applied for a payment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
